title: "Retrace Achieves EHNAC Healthcare Network Accreditation"
excerpt: "Retrace , a leader in dental artificial intelligence and the first native-built AI healthcare clearinghouse providing digital infrastructure for US health care, announced today it has achieved full accreditation with the Healthcare Network Accreditation Program (HNAP) for Electronic Health Networks (EHN) from the Electronic Healthcare Network Accreditation Commission."
